Future projects

May 22, 2019

First post with a list of cool projects for the future!

Hello World! Here’s our list of cool projects coming up:

Future:

  1. Sparse GPLVM
  2. VAE+denoising VAE
  3. GAN
  4. Optimisation algorithms (k-fac)
  5. Pole balancing
  6. Natural gradients
  7. Deep GPs
  8. Semantic segmentation (CRFs)
  9. Invertible Resnet
  10. Self-driving car
  11. Music generation
  12. Occam's bound (mebe not?)

Done:

  1. Sparse Variational GPs (Titsias)
  2. GPLVMs
  3. HMC

Love, Greg and Stratis
